Name: No School No Rules
About the game: Immerse yourself in the full cycle of life of the most severe school in Russia! No School No Rules will tell you the story of a Russian schoolboy Ivan who is on the verge of graduation and dropping out of school. But he has his own plans ... He intends to finish school in his own way and, along the way, take revenge on all teachers and local hooligans. Make your way from a simple schoolboy to the main solver, sweeping away everyone in your path. It's time not to leave anyone a chance! Fight, steal, and fight your way to the top of the school hierarchy to put everyone in their place at the end! STORY LINE AND INTERACTIVE DIALOGUES Go through an exciting storyline with different endings. Lots of off-story missions and assignments. A well-thought-out system of dialogues, you yourself choose what to answer. All your decisions affect the world and environment in the game. BUILT-IN COOPERATIVE MODE Separate multiplayer mode with friends! Do you want to assemble a team and destroy the school? Or take revenge on this vile teacher? What if you sneaked into class, changed your magazine grades, and presented a few surprises? Only your imagination decides! UPGRADE YOUR CHARACTER Complete storyline or secondary tasks, get experience points for them and distribute them among the branches of opportunities. Powerful punches and tricks, or stealth and theft? Create your own unique character up to a versatile stealth fighter! ■ Hand-to-hand combat - to learn new techniques and inflict more serious injuries on your opponents. ■ Stealth - for invisible penetration, breaking office doors and pickpocketing. ■ Eloquence - persuade, intimidate, bribe, find new allies and eliminate opponents not only by force. FULL FREEDOM OF ACTION Only you decide what to do now! Explore the school, improve your character, start massive fights or complete missions. Immerse yourself in the full life cycle of a Russian school!
